news.title: Asia-Pacific real estate assets at 'high risk' from climate change: Report
news.para: What we are seeing is that the physical risks to built assets increase over time under climate change, and are particularly more pronounced in scenarios where global warming is allowed to accelerate," said lead author Philip Tapsall.

news.title: Lowe's sales decline by 4.1% in Q1 2024
news.para: Shares of the company were down as much as 3% after executives said that they expect current-quarter comparable sales decline to be in line with the first quarter.

news.title: Nominal growth in housing prices expected in coming years: Anshul Jain, Head, Cushman & Wakefield India
news.para: The Chief Executive India & South East Asia and APAC Tenant Representation, Cushman & Wakefield, said the housing demand would continue to be strong in view of high economic growth and a growing desire to own homes among consumers.

news.title: Thane-based developer arrested for cheating flat buyers
news.para: According to the police, the complainants had entered into an agreement with the developer in 2016 to purchase flats measuring over 650 square feet each in the Mogharpada area of Ghodbunder Road.

news.title: CapitaLand Investment appoints Sumit Gera as CEO for India Business Parks
news.para: As part of CLI’s leadership succession plans, Gera has assumed the position from Gauri Shankar Nagabhushanam, who has been appointed as CEO (Designate) of CapitaLand India Trust (CLINT).

news.title: Awfis raises Rs 268 crore from anchor investors ahead of IPO
news.para: Those who participated in the anchor round include -- Goldman Sachs, EastBridge Capital Master Fund, HDFC Mutual Fund (MF), ICICI Prudential MF, Axis MF, UTI MF, Aditya Birla Sun Life Insurance Company and SBI General Insurance Company.

news.title: WestBridge Capital reduces stake in Aptus Value Housing Finance by 5%
news.para: WestBridge Capital through its affiliate WestBridge Crossover Fund LLC offloaded shares of Aptus Value Housing Finance India, while JIH II LLC sold its shares in two separate deals, according to the data on the National Stock Exchange (NSE).

news.title: Nexus Select Trust in talks to buy Marina Mall in Chennai
news.para: Nexus Select Trust in talks to acquire The Marina Mall in Chennai, developing a diverse portfolio with Grade-A malls in Hyderabad. Plans to double assets to 20M sq ft in 5 years, reflecting India's retail growth and mall consumption surge.

news.title: Enforcement directorate attaches assets worth Rs 59-crore of IREO, others
news.para: Land parcels and bank deposits worth Rs 58.93 crore of IREO group of companies and some others have been provisionally attached under the provisions of the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA), it said.

news.title: Portugal's Mota-Engil reports 54% rise in net profit in Q1 2024
news.para: The construction company, which operates in 20 countries across Africa, Europe and Latin America, said net profit totalled 20 million euros for January to March, up from 13 million euros a year earlier.

news.title: Germany property trough worsens as foreign investors scale back
news.para: The grim figures coincide with a debate about whether Germany is once again "the sick man of Europe" - a label it was given in late 1990s as it struggled with economic stagnation and high unemployment.

news.title: China will control property sector risk: Vice Premier
news.para: China is seeking to restore confidence in its financial system, which is mired in a property crisis and mounting local government debt, as the economy faces a host of challenges.

news.title: Action Construction Equipment's net profit up 108.80% in Q4 FY24
news.para: Action Construction Equipment's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 856.76 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 38.87 per cent from Rs 616.96 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: JSW Cement to invest around Rs 3,000 crore to establish cement facility in Rajasthan
news.para: The investment in the new cement facility includes a clinkerization unit of up to 3.30 MTPA and a grinding unit of up to 2.50 MTPA, along with an 18 MW waste heat recovery based power plant.

news.title: Shriram Properties to jointly develop four acre land in Yelahanka, Bengaluru
news.para: The proposed project will comprise of 270 apartments with an aggregate saleable area of ~3.8 lakh sq ft. It has aggregate revenue potential of over Rs 250 crores and is expected to be developed over the next three years.

news.title: India Cements to sell surplus land to augment cash flow
news.para: India Cements sold non-core assets worth Rs 42 crore in FY24 to fund cash flow requirements and efficiency improvement. Loss decreased to Rs 29.3 crore in Q4 FY24 with revenue declining by 14.7%.

news.title: Goa: Even after HC rap, illegal sand mining on in Ragada, say locals
news.para: Ragada, a tributary of the Mhadei, rises in the hilly terrain of the Western Ghats in Karnataka and enters Goa through the Tambdi Surla forest.

news.title: NFRA bars auditors of Reliance Home Finance & Reliance Commercial Finance
news.para: Auditor of Reliance Capital, another group company, had faced similar action last month. Anil Ambani's financial services group faced insolvency action and accounting frauds at group companies may increase the headache.

news.title: Project loan provisions to impact earnings due to limited pass-through: Banks to RBI
news.para: On May 3, the RBI issued draft norms proposing a 5% provision for existing and new project loans, commercial loans, and real estate loans against 0.4% to 1% stipulated on such loans by the regulator.

news.title: Go First's creditors to auction 94-acre land parcel in Thane
news.para: Creditors are set to auction a prime 94-acre land parcel in Thane near Mumbai, previously collateral for loans taken by Go First Airlines.
